byline: Katie Meyer of Spotlight PA and Carter Walker of Votebeat
budget: Democrats in Pa. approach 2024 election with slimmest voter registration advantage in decades
hed: Democrats in Pa. approach 2024 election with slimmest voter registration advantage in decades
description: Despite some gains, registered Democrats are losing ground to Republicans in Pennsylvania as the 2024 election approaches.
lede_image_description: Northampton County voters head to the polls on Nov. 7, 2023, at the Forks Township Community Center.
blurb: Despite some gains, registered Democrats are losing ground to Republicans in Pennsylvania as the 2024 election approaches.
seo_title: Registered Democrats are losing ground in Pennsylvania
og_title: Democrats see weakest voter registration edge in decades
twitter_title: Democrats see weakest voter registration edge in decades
